text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After El Condor Pasa's amazing<n>performance at the
tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's been training with new trainers<n>every day, going
through their<n>proposed training programs.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Now, who wants to present me with<n>their training program
today?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'll do any exercise, no matter how<n>tough! Be strict! Show
no mercy! I'm<n>lookin' forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Finally! Today's my turn, El Condor<n>Pasa!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Sprint one lap, then jog the next!<n>Then repeat this one
hundred times!<n>It's the same program the world<n>champion
does!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, the world champion?! Then<n>it's good, great, perfect
for me! Let's<n>get to it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That day, El Condor Pasa, who<n>hasn't even debuted yet,
does the<n>same training that the world champion<n>does...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
At last, today is my turn! You see,<n>I've been working with a
certain<n>university lab that works on<n>developing
cutting-edge training<n>equipment.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
And from that lab came this training<n>cast! It's a brilliant
device that puts<n>twenty times your normal weight on<n>your
body!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Cutting-edge? Twenty times?<n>Brilliant?! I don't really
get it, but it<n>sounds cool! Let's get to it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Another day, El Condor Pasa covers<n>her entire body in a
mysterious<n>training cast...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What does one need to take on the<n>world?! It's passion!
Zeal! An<n>unbreakable will! Come, let us yell<n>unto the
horizon, El!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whoaaa! I like your passion!<n>Understood! I'll give it a go!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I am the one! The only! The<n>indomitable fighter! The
lightspeed<n>storm! The strongest in the world—El<n>Condor
Pasaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This time, she's yelling at the setting<n>sun until her throat
goes dry. No matter<n>the training, she seems to takes it all<n>
in stride...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Until one day, I spot El Condor Pasa<n>walking with a slight
wobble in her<n>gait.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whew... Sleepy... Spinning... I'm...<n>dizzy...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Are you okay? El, aren't you<n>overworking yourself
recently?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mmngh? Not... at all. I'm fine, fit as a<n>fid—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh man, I'm so sorry! My legs<n>wobbled for a second there.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Wait a sec! You're... the line cutter!<n>What a coincidence!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, nothing to worry about at all!<n>As you can see, I'm an
energetic,<n>motivated, and unparalleled condor—

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
O-ow! G-Grass?! That was way too<n>pinpoint to be an
accident!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Gosh... My apologies. Are you hurt<n>anywhere?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
As of late, El has been undergoing<n>rough training with a
new trainer every<n>day, so it appears she is quite spent.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
W-w-whoa, Grass-Grass-Grass?! I<n>can't pretend like I
didn't hear that!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm always telling you, aren't I? That<n>I'm the world's
strongest racer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: The condor soars the skies so thatone day it may carve its name in theannals of history! That's itsfuture—my future!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
So I can't! Stop! Now! No way am I<n>gonna complain when
I'm just getting<n>started!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there you are, El! I've come up<n>with a program for you!
Please train<n>with me today!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Look! Another potential partner is<n>here for me!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: And with that, I bid you adios! Grass,<n>see you tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El, wait a—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Before that, I almost forgot! Trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You must be reeeally taking your time<n>with my program...
Isn't that right? I<n>totally get it! ♪

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm eagerly waiting for your training<n>program! Anyways,
this time for real.<n>Chao!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ah... She said her fill and then<n>immediately left. Same as
usual, I<n>suppose.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
And today, just like always, she'll<n>spend the day with a
new trainer<n>aiming to be the world's strongest.
choice_data_list: She's a determined one, isn't she?
She's a determined one, isn't she?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hm... It might be more accurate to say<n>she is stubborn... But
I suppose so.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
She sets huge goals for herself<n>without any fear, and she'll
do<n>anything to make those goals reality. I<n>respect that part
about her.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
However... I believe even that side of<n>her can become
detrimental at times.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Yes... At the very least, by working<n>with a new trainer every
day, her<n>fatigue from the previous day is not<n>being taken
into consideration.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Therefore, her fatigue has only<n>continued to build up.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
...If things get dangerous, I won't<n>hesitate to stop her by
force. After all,<n>she is not the type of person to stop<n>after a
mild scolding.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Which reminds me, are you not also<n>trying to scout El
yourself?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
It may be impertinent of me, but I<n>implore you to give what I
have told<n>you some thought.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even without Grass Wonder's<n>advice, it's clear that El
Condor Pasa<n>has a strong will and an even<n>stronger
desire to train.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As a trainer, what can I do to help<n>make her dreams come
true?
